citation: Shop Trading Hours (Anzac Day) Amendment Order 2018 (Tas)
text:
Shop Trading Hours (Anzac Day) Amendment Order 2018

I make the following order under section 5AAA(2)(c) of the Shop Trading Hours Act 1984 .

11 April 2018

GUY BARNETT

Minister for Building and Construction

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Shop Trading Hours (Anzac Day) Amendment Order 2018 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Principal Order
    In this order, the Shop Trading Hours (Anzac Day) Order 2016 is referred to as the Principal Order.

4.
    The amendment effected by this clause has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Shop Trading Hours (Anzac Day) Order 2016 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 18 April 2018
